name: It's Just a Cookie. Believe me.
name_original: It's Just a Cookie. Believe me.
description: Nothing to say honestly. If you buy this then you might come out positive or negative. There is your daily dose of Drama. When you open the app it will say that windows protected you from this virus. Trust me this is my second game and I really dont know how to stop that message and im 12 and I know nothing about viruses. and it also is made with gdevelop engine so its safe :)
